text:
With the sudden closure of @jumpshipstudio, I'm looking for a new role

I'm looking for anywhere I can make beautiful things with code, my ideal role would be a mix of graphics programming, technical art, and gameplay programming (or anything else interactive) https://t.co/ibZGYCqrna
